markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background A vast expanse of open ocean to the northwest, by the [Razai Passage](/razaiPassage/). The few small islands that make up the only land in this area are spaced far apart. ## Points of interest ## =Southern island = * [50px](/fileIconMountain1CaveRightPng/) '''[Cave of Threshing](/caveOfThreshing/) (Fampyr's Crypt)''': An ancient Engwithan sacrificial facility, now occupied by fampyrs.
* [50px](/fileIconForestDarkPng/) '''[Bent Bough Forest](/bentBoughForest/)''': A dense forest where you can find a battered journal with Survival 17. The [Waterlogged Journal](/waterloggedJournal/) helps find the [Sanguine Great Sword](/sanguineGreatSword/) and the recruitable crew member [Winking Audr](/winkingAudr/).
## =Northwestern island = A large island in the northwestern corner of the map. * [50px](/fileIconMountain1CaveLeftPng/) '''[Outcast's Respite](/outcastsRespite/)''': A remote cave, and home of [Bipara](/bipara/), a bog witch.
* [50px](/fileIconBogPng/) '''[Boot-suck Bog](/bootSuckBog/)''': The Bog requires Survival 19 to get through, otherwise you'll need Athletics 18 to get your tracker out of trouble. Then you'll be accosted by a group of cultists and need Diplomacy 18 to get by without a fight. Otherwise, you'll fight three high level Rangers and two bog lurkers. It's worth noting that they drop a [Ring of Greater Regeneration](/ringOfGreaterRegeneration/), so it might be worth it. ## =Northern island = A desert island to the extreme north. * [50px](/fileIconVillagePng/) '''[Junvik Village](/junvikVillage/)''': A small dwarven village in the desert, consisting of a cluster of small clay huts.
* [50px](/fileIconDrownedBarrowsPng/) '''[Drowned Barrows](/drownedBarrows/)''': A rather ominous skull-shaped cave, and the domain of [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourer/).
* [50px](/fileIconCliffsPng/) '''Captain Henquya's Treasure''': Contains Captain Henquya's treasure after completing all four bounties for [Dessiral](/dessiral/). The treasure consists of several hundred copper pieces, jewels and [Magnera's Chain](/magnerasChain/).
* [50px](/fileIconShipwreckPng/) '''Shipwreck'''
## =Northeastern island = * [50px](/fileIconOriOKoikiPng/) '''[Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/)''': The heart of the Wahaki tribe.
## =Others = * [50px](/fileIconReefPng/) '''[School of Fish](/schoolOfFish/)''': Around the center of the area is a school of fish, which will lead to an encounter with a barbed ravager - a giant sea beast of Engwithan design. To defeat it, your cannoneers must have at least 8 skill when summed up.
## Gallery PE2 RM Ori o Koiki.png | Ori o Koīki PE2 RM Fampyr Island.png | Fampyr Island PE2 RM Outcast respite.png | Outcast's Respite PE2 RM Junvik.png | Junvik Village
raw:
{{Infobox location poe2 | game = poe2 | map = PE2 Rikuhu's Maw.png | caption_map = Overview of the maw | name = Rikuhu's Maw | type = Archipelago | description = | exits = | sub_locations = Ori o Koīki;Cave of Threshing;Outcast's Respite;Junvik Village;Drowned Barrows | main_location = Deadfire Archipelago | merchant = | innkeeper = | inhabitants = | plants = | expected_level= | grants_xp = yes | override_xp = 2000 | is_crit_path = | can_camp = | zone_id = | internalname = | guid = }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. ==Background== A vast expanse of open ocean to the northwest, by the [[Razai Passage]]. The few small islands that make up the only land in this area are spaced far apart. ==Points of interest== ===Southern island=== * [[File:Icon Mountain 1 Cave Right.png|50px|left]] '''[[Cave of Threshing]] (Fampyr's Crypt)''': An ancient Engwithan sacrificial facility, now occupied by fampyrs.
* [[File:Icon Forest Dark.png|50px|left]] '''[[Bent Bough Forest]]''': A dense forest where you can find a battered journal with Survival 17. The [[Waterlogged Journal]] helps find the [[Sanguine Great Sword]] and the recruitable crew member [[Winking Audr]].
===Northwestern island=== A large island in the northwestern corner of the map. * [[File:Icon Mountain 1 Cave Left.png|50px|left]] '''[[Outcast's Respite]]''': A remote cave, and home of [[Bipara]], a bog witch.
* [[File:Icon Bog.png|50px|left]] '''[[Boot-suck Bog]]''': The Bog requires Survival 19 to get through, otherwise you'll need Athletics 18 to get your tracker out of trouble. Then you'll be accosted by a group of cultists and need Diplomacy 18 to get by without a fight. Otherwise, you'll fight three high level Rangers and two bog lurkers. It's worth noting that they drop a [[Ring of Greater Regeneration]], so it might be worth it. ===Northern island=== A desert island to the extreme north. * [[File:Icon Village.png|50px|left]] '''[[Junvik village|Junvik Village]]''': A small dwarven village in the desert, consisting of a cluster of small clay huts.
* [[File:Icon Drowned Barrows.png|50px|left]] '''[[Drowned Barrows]]''': A rather ominous skull-shaped cave, and the domain of [[Nemnok the Devourer]].
* [[File:Icon Cliffs.png|50px|left]] '''Captain Henquya's Treasure''': Contains Captain Henquya's treasure after completing all four bounties for [[Dessiral]]. The treasure consists of several hundred copper pieces, jewels and [[Magnera's Chain]].
* [[File:Icon Shipwreck.png|50px|left]] '''Shipwreck'''
===Northeastern island=== * [[File:Icon Ori o Koiki.png|50px|left]] '''[[Ori o Koīki]]''': The heart of the Wahaki tribe.
===Others=== * [[File:Icon Reef.png|50px|left]] '''[[School of Fish]]''': Around the center of the area is a school of fish, which will lead to an encounter with a barbed ravager - a giant sea beast of Engwithan design. To defeat it, your cannoneers must have at least 8 skill when summed up.
==Gallery== PE2 RM Ori o Koiki.png | Ori o Koīki PE2 RM Fampyr Island.png | Fampyr Island PE2 RM Outcast respite.png | Outcast's Respite PE2 RM Junvik.png | Junvik Village
title: Rikuhu's Maw
